column5: Hi guys Anyone know how to open up one of these files on a windows based 'puter? thanks
Send it to someone with PHotoshop and have them convert it.  JF
tried irfanview and ghostfile..still didnt work for some reason...kind of new to that software thanks for posting though guys..appreciate it
if it's an important doc, PM me and i'll send you my email. you can send it to me and i'll convert to pdf for ya
